event.name: Atomik::RenderFile::Before
event.description: Fired at the beginning of a call to Atomik::renderFile().
event.refparam: Filename of the file that will be rendered
Whether to echo the view output or return it

event.name: Atomik::RenderFile::After
event.description: Fired after the inclusion of the file.
event.param: Filename of the file that will be rendered
event.refparam: The output of the rendered file
Whether to echo the view output or return it

event.name: Atomik::Output::Before
event.refparam: The content that will be echoed

event.name: Atomik::Output::After
event.description: Fired after content has been echoed.
event.param: The content that has been echoed
